context.p: If your system uses the optional Broker component of Eucalyptus, shut it down by performing the following steps:

step.cmd: Log in as root to the machine running both the CC and the VMware Broker.

info.note: The eucalyptus-cloud stop command also shuts down a CLC, Walrus, and SC components co-located with the CC and VMware Broker to stop at the same time, in the correct order.
